nodes.text: Star Wars Manga was a series of manga style comics adapting films from the Star Wars saga. The original trilogy and The Phantom Menace were adapted. Tokyopop also released two new manga books in the vein of Star Wars Tales. In 2009, Take Shobo published two manga books based on The Clone Wars television series.
Star Wars Manga: A New Hope
Star Wars Manga: The Empire Strikes Back
Star Wars Manga: Return of the Jedi
Star Wars Manga: The Phantom Menace
Star Wars: The Clone Wars Manga
